title: Fitbit preparing more wearables including likely Versa 4 and Sense 2, no sign of Wear OS
content:
Evidence within the Fitbit app suggests that Google’s acquisition has multiple fitness wearables on the horizon, none of which appear to run Wear OS.

more…

The post Fitbit preparing more wearables including likely Versa 4 and Sense 2, no sign of Wear OS appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Evidence within the Fitbit app suggests that Google’s acquisition has multiple wearables on the horizon, none of which appear to run Wear OS.
